title: The most OP team i ever played against

embed.description: Every game is a story; visit the new League of Legends match history to check out how this one ends and share your own!

body: If you look at the gold lead my team had over theirs all game up till late game you will see how far ahead we were. Then it got silly. They were unkillable no matter how much CC I put out with nautilus, the twitch would sometimes sneak in, the hecarim tank AF and dealing so much freaking damage would just ult to the back line, and the Leona ult would catch at least 1 or 2 people, then ahri charms. The karma damage is insane compared to how tanky she becomes wit her shield and shit. Late game was a freaking night mare. We couldn't win a single team fight. This is insane. I am trying to just laugh it off and not tilt. but holy shit what do you do when you hit this unmoving wall? The most insane game ever. They're team was literally unkillable. One time Hecarim dived 3v1 at late game and tanked like 5-6 tower shots + Caitlyn attacks, while I CC'd him, plus ori attacks, and only lost 2/3 HP, and killed cait and got away. It was just ridiculous...... We tried so hard to win but like what do you do? I don't think it was possible to win that

replies.body: That looks more like a colossal throw than an op team.

> [{quoted}](name=I am Pacman,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IMRdGXQR,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-12-09T05:31:43.592+0000)
>
> That looks more like a colossal throw than an op team.

Well we got *dragon* and they came in and we had a team fight. Well they melted our whole team and I think we only got 1 or 2 of them. This was pretty much just after lane phase had ended. At about 20 minutes. We had just started grouping. Once it was about team fights and not roams, ganks and catching people off, we were playing by their rules. Like there was nothing we could do against them in team fights.

> [{quoted}](name=The Username,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=IMRdGXQR,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2016-12-09T05:34:12.895+0000)
>
> Like there was nothing we could do against them in team fights.

the power of a good twitch with a good initiation
why do you think people ban twitch all the time nowadays, he is worse than vayne

it's just 8k lead, happens all the time

i saw it can happen even with 12+k lead

p.s. also the main reason for your loss seems to be twitch and his very strong late game, especially together with hecarim/leona. twitch seems the main reason of your early lead too; note also that shyvana kind of falls of late game and cait falls of mid being strong again late (not that strong as twitch)
